tools.name: Weather
tools.llm_instructions:
The user is asking about weather. Extract the city or location name from their message. Respond ONLY with a JSON tool-call in this exact format (no other text):
{"tool":"weather","location":"<city name>","description":"<brief friendly description of what they asked>"}

tools.name: Yahoo Finance
tools.llm_instructions:
The user is asking about a stock, cryptocurrency, or financial instrument. Extract the company name or ticker symbol from their message. Respond ONLY with a JSON tool-call in this exact format (no other text):
{"tool":"yfinance","query":"<company name or ticker>","range":"1mo","interval":"1d","description":"<brief friendly description of what they asked>"}
